data.Name: error indicator
data.Definition: Indicator that an item is in error

data.Name: error rate
data.Definition: Number of the erroneous items with respect to the total number of items that should have been present

data.Name: error count
data.Definition: Total number of items that are subject to an error of a specified type

data.Name: correctness indicator
data.Definition: Indicator that an item is correct

data.Name: correct items count
data.Definition: Total number of items that are free of errors of a specified type

data.Name: correct items rate
data.Definition: Number of the correct items with respect to the total number of items that should have been present

data.Name: One dimensional variable 50 % probability
data.Definition: confidence interval given by the probability P=50 % of the true value being between the lower and upper limit

data.Name: One dimensional variable 50 % probability redundancy
data.Definition: confidence interval for probability P=50 % derived from t-distribution by redundant measurements
